dialog: KID! YOU PULLED IT OFF!
YOU'RE A REAL NATURAL...\CLEANEST JOB I'VE SEEN\IN YEARS!
I'M AFRAID I CAN'T SAY\THE SAME.
WHAT THE...? WHO THE HELL\ARE YOU?
MY NAME IS CHASTE. I'VE\BEEN HIRED TO DO CONTRACT\WORK AT THIS LOCATION.
IN FACT, I WAS JUST ON MY\WAY OVER WHEN I HEARD\THE EXPLOSIONS.
TO MY SURPRISE, SOMEONE\ELSE HAD ALREADY GOTTEN\STARTED.
ALMOST AS THOUGH THEY HAD\INTERCEPTED MY CALL WITH\AN ILLEGAL RADIO\SCANNER.
ALMOST LIKE THE KIND YOU\HAVE IN YOUR CAR.
...YOU CAN'T PROVE\THAT'S MINE.
WHY DON'T YOU JUST STEP\OFF? THE WAY I SEE IT,\WE JUST DID YOUR JOB\FOR YOU.
HARDLY. THIS IS SOME OF\THE SLOPPIEST WORK I'VE\SEEN IN MY CAREER.
WHICH IS WHY I'M WRITING\YOU TWO UP. UTTER\DISREGARD FOR\PROTOCOL.
WHAT?!
HUH?!
THE NOISE POLLUTION...\NOT TO MENTION THE\CONTAMINANTS YOU'VE\RELEASED...
SURELY YOU UNDERSTAND THE\SPLATICAN WOULD HAVE MY\HEAD IF THEY THOUGHT I\WAS RESPONSIBLE.
HOW ABOUT YOU BLOW ME? I\BUSTED MY ASS DOWN THERE!
WELL, SINCE YOU'VE BEEN\SO UNPROFESSIONAL ABOUT\THIS WHOLE THING...
...LET ME OFFER YOU THE\SAME COURTESY.
EAT IT. YOU TWO AREN'T\CUT OUT TO BE\EXTERMINATORS.
WANNA GET SOMETHING\TO EAT?
SURE.
